attributes.action: abolish the 16 month limit for non-inductible supply teaching
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to abolish the 16 month limit for non-inductible supply teaching.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=16monthsupply


Her Majesty's Government
